snippet: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton made a brief stop in Laos, the first visit by an American secretary of state in 57 years and one marked by the legacy of the Vietnam War.
abstract: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton makes a brief stop on her Asia tour in Laos, the first visit by an American secretary of state in 57 years and one that brings into stark relief the enduring legacy of the Vietnam War.
lead_paragraph: Secretary of State Hillary Rodham Clinton made a brief stop in Laos, the first visit by an American secretary of state in 57 years and one marked by the legacy of the Vietnam War.

headline.main: Vietnam War’s Legacy Is Vivid as Clinton Visits Laos
headline.print_headline: Vietnam War’s Legacy Is Vivid as Clinton Visits Laos
